cli_content:
Type: S-Static   D-Dynamic   O-Openflow   R-Rule   M-Multiport  I-Invalid
IP address      MAC address    VLAN     Interface                Aging Type
10.20.10.1      001e-c1dc-fc01 N/A      M-GE0/0/0                16    D
10.20.1.254     001e-c1dc-fc01 1        XGE1/0/47                16    D
10.20.1.2       2c23-3a40-7e18 1        XGE1/0/48                5     D
textfsm_template:
Value IP_ADDRESS (\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+)
Value MAC_ADDRESS (\w+-\w+-\w+)
Value VLAN_ID (\S+|\d+)
Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value AGING (\d+)
Value TYPE (\S+)

Start
  ^${IP_ADDRESS}\s+${MAC_ADDRESS}\s+${VLAN_ID}\s+${INTERFACE}\s+${AGING}\s+${TYPE} -> Record
